description: Sarath Menikpura vs. Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Sarath Menikpura vs. Hon. Attorney General
keywords: - Belatedness of making a complaint about an offence committed against a child. - Reasons for silence of a child victim of a sexual offence. - Whether corroboration of the evidence of the prosecutrix is essential. - Prosecutrix’s evidence can be corroborated by the medical evidence. - Improbable and unbelievable dock statement cannot raise a reasonable doubt. - Applicability of Section 114(f) of the Evidence Ordinance.
